statements: SELECT student_name, progress FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, progress FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_materials FROM students WHERE course_materials IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, certifications FROM students WHERE certifications ->> 'certificate_type' = 'Professional';
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE certifications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY progress ASC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, certifications FROM students WHERE LENGTH(student_name) > 5 AND progress >= 70;
SELECT student_id, course_materials FROM students WHERE JSON_LENGTH(course_materials) > 2 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT progress FROM students WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 80;
SELECT student_id, course_id, last_accessed FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY last_accessed DESC;
SELECT course_id, material_name FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type='Video';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE last_accessed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_percentage >= 80 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, material_id, material_name, material_type FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(progress_percentage) AS highest_progress FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, course_id, MAX(last_accessed) AS last_accessed FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY student_id, course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video';
SELECT certification_id, student_id, course_id, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT student_id, MAX(progress_percentage) AS highest_progress FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT course_id, AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM student_progress GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, course_id, material_name FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'quiz';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age, email FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT title, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50;
SELECT certification_id, student_id, course_id, certification_date FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE progress_percentage > 70;
SELECT name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT title, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY title;

SELECT certifications.certification_date, students.name, courses.title FROM certifications JOIN students ON certifications.student_id = students.student_id JOIN courses ON certifications.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE certifications.certification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certifications.certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, gender FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Courses.start_date, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Courses INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Certifications.issue_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Certifications ON Students.student_id = Certifications.student_id;
